title: LF Free Coaches For Our Team
body:
Hey all,

My team is Uprise eSports and we currently have two teams Team Lux and Team Nox.

We are looking for free coaches that are at least Diamond 2 that are willing to help us not only on an individual level but with our team play as well. Most of the players on the team are around Gold. We are aiming to help the players get to at least High Plat - Diamond by the end of the season.
My Discord is KDAs#0352.
Please message me if you are interested or if you have any other questions. 
Thank you !
